title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When attempting to open a file with a different type of editor while the file is already open in another editor, no action is taken and the file remains open in the original editor.
EB: When a user tries to open a file with a different type of editor while the file is already open in another editor, the file should be closed from the original editor and opened in the new editor.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the software. 2. Create a new basic project. 3. Create a new file named test.xml. 4. The editor used is the scripted resource editor example, which ignores the XML file content. 5. In the Navigator, select test.xml. 6. Right-click and choose 'Open With...' > 'Default Text Editor'. Observe that nothing happens and the file remains open in the scripted resource editor example.
